subject: Quick trawl
msgSnippet: Dear All, Sorry but this is a quick trawl. I have been given an introductory Java module to teach. The module as it runs at present uses the BlueJ environment.
messageBody:
Dear All,
Sorry but this is a quick trawl.
I have been given an introductory Java module to teach. The module
as it runs at present uses the BlueJ environment. I have it in the back
of my mind to introduce some Test-Driven Development. Does anyone here know
( or better use ) a BlueJ environment that has been embellished with JUnit
support ?
Thanks,
David
